{{cpp/experimental/observer_ptr/title|swap}}
{{cpp/experimental/lib extensions 2/observer_ptr/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=libfund_ts_2|1=
constexpr void swap( observer_ptr&amp; other ) noexcept;
}}

Swaps the watched object of {{c|*this}} and another {{c|observer_ptr}} object {{c|other}}, by invoking {{c|swap}} on the stored pointers of {{c|*this}} and {{c|other}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|other|another {{c|observer_ptr}} object to swap the watched object with}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
